All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ApplicationWindow
This class creates the window in which the application will main application will run
Brush_Setting_Toolbox
Creates a toolbox where you can set the width of brush, dot interval and whatnot.
Brush_Toolbox
Class to represent one section of the toolbar, a toolbox that contains main drawing stationaries
CanvasM
Creates a canvas in which the art will be made
CanvasZoom
Class that provides the zoom functionality of the pixel editor
Colour
This class changes the colour of the paintbrush
Colour_Toolbox
Class to represent one section of the toolbar, a toolbox that contains all accessible colours
ColourWheel
Class used to create the colour wheel popup
CutPaste
Class that handles the cut and paste functionality and also implements a rectangular selection tool that allows user to select an area on canvas for which area the user wants to cut/paste
FillShape
fill shapes with a color
ImportImg_Toolbox
Creates a toolbox that contains import img button
Layer
layer for adding images
MemeMachine
This class creates an instance of the driver used to run the program
RibbonMainMenu
This class is used to create the ribbon menu at the top of the application window
RightClickMenu
Creates a popup menu, should be used for right click functionality
SelectImg
Button for selecting an image to drag
Shape
An interface class for implementing shapes
Shape_Circle
Class that implements the Shape interface class to draw a shape (in this case a circle)
Shape_PopWin
Class for a popup window when insert button is clicked to select which shape you want to insert
Shape_Rectangle
Class that implements the Shape interface class to draw a shape (in this case a rectangle)
Shape_Triangle
Class that implements the Shape interface class to draw a shape (in this case a triangle)
ShapeInterface
Shape interface class for drawing shapes on canvas
TextBox
Class to create text boxes - non functional code, is not implmented by program
ToolBox
Class for the toolbox
ToolSquare
Class for ToolSquare
